forms.name: Select Invoice for Review Static
Review Invoice Static

flow.name: Organisational Approval
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <process isExecutable="true" name="Organisational Approval" id="organisationalapproval">
    <startEvent name="Start" id="startevent1"/>
    <endEvent name="End" id="endevent1"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_documentSelection_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Organisational Approval Document Selection" id="documentSelection"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_documentView_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Organisational Approval Document View" id="documentView"/>
    <exclusiveGateway default="notdone" name="Exclusive Gateway" id="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:type="mail" name="Organisational Approval Result Notification" id="resultNotification">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="from">
          <activiti:string>approvalResult@point.io</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="html">
          <activiti:expression>Document ${documentNumber} has been ${approvalStatus} with the following comments:
${approvalComments}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="subject">
          <activiti:expression>Document ${documentNumber} has been ${approvalStatus}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="to">
          <activiti:expression>${wf_origId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="documentSelection" sourceRef="startevent1" id="flow1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="documentView" sourceRef="documentSelection" id="flow2"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway1" sourceRef="documentView" id="flow3"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="resultNotification" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" id="done">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${approvalStatus == 'rejected' || approvalStatus == 'approved'}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="resultNotification" id="flow5"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="documentView" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" id="notdone"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_organisationalapproval">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_organisationalapproval" bpmnElement="organisationalapproval">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_startevent1" bpmnElement="startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="60.0" x="20.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_endevent1" bpmnElement="endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="60.0" x="650.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_documentSelection" bpmnElement="documentSelection">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="50.0" x="100.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_documentView" bpmnElement="documentView">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="50.0" x="260.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1" bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="57.0" x="412.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_resultNotification" bpmnElement="resultNotification">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="50.0" x="500.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow1" bpmnElement="flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="55.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="100.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow2" bpmnElement="flow2">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="205.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="260.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow3" bpmnElement="flow3">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="365.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="412.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_done" bpmnElement="done">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="452.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="500.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow5" bpmnElement="flow5">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="605.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="77.0" x="650.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_notdone" bpmnElement="notdone">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="97.0" x="432.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="147.0" x="431.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="147.0" x="313.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="105.0" x="312.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>
